scenes.background: (Monica) taps her pen on the table. (Bob) looks frustrated.
scenes.description: ‘We really need to address this issue. Can we count on you to help us sort this out?’

options.text: I can offer some guidance, but you’ll need to handle most of the work.
options.analysis: You offered limited help, showing good perception and social skills, but empathy could be improved.

options.text: I’m on leave, but I can help if it’s absolutely necessary.
options.analysis: You acknowledged your leave but showed willingness to help if crucial, demonstrating strong self-regulation but lower social skills and motivation.

options.text: This seems like something you should be able to handle without me.
options.analysis: Your response was somewhat dismissive, showing lower empathy and self-regulation, which might affect team relationships negatively.
